name: Captain Drake's Family Aerial Adventures
about: Captain Drake's Family Aerial Adventures is a specialized flight school located in scenic Southern Oregon, offering an all-inclusive training experience for those seeking certification in light sport airplanes, gyroplanes, and ultralight aircraft. We provide comprehensive instruction for sport pilot and ultralight airmen, ensuring a thorough and enjoyable learning environment. Our facility is based at the Illinois Valley Airport, where students can take advantage of our expert instructors and state-of-the-art training equipment. We also offer comfortable housing options for our students, making your training experience seamless and stress-free. Whether you're looking for a unique aerial vacation or a serious flight training program, Captain Drake's Family Aerial Adventures is the perfect destination for your aviation aspirations. Join us for an unforgettable adventure in the skies.
